resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e006e2c1-8f19-4ba6-9140-8f26a6885e84#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Sivatagi róka</string>
            <string language="en">Fennec fox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fennec Fuchs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renard de Fennec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Raposa de Fennec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Volpe di Fennec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλεπού Fennec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Zorro de Fennec</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Sivatagi róka. Az afrikai félsivatagok kutyaféle ragadozója. Nagy fülkagylói segítik a hőleadást.</string>
            <string language="en">Fennec fox. African semi-desert's canine rapacious. Big external ears help it to transmit of heat. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ragadozók,  sivatag,  </string>
            <string language="en">Mammalia, placentalia, carnivores, desert</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fennec Fuchs. Afrikanisches Halbwüsten- 
Hunde- rapacious. Grosse externe Ohren helfen ihm, um von der 
Hitze zu übertragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renard de Fennec. Rapace canin africain de 
semi-finale-desert's. Grande aide externe d'oreilles il à 
transmettre de la chaleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Raposa de Fennec. Rapacious canine 
semi-desert africano. As orelhas externas grandes ajudam-lhe 
transmitir do calor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Volpe di Fennec. Rapacious canino 
semideserto africano. Gli orecchi esterni grandi la aiutano per 
trasmettere di calore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλεπού Fennec. Αφρικανικό semi-desert 
canine αρπακτικό. Τα μεγάλα εξωτερικά αυτιά το βοηθούν 
για να διαβιβάσουν της θερμότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Zorro de Fennec. Rapaz canino semi-desert 
africano. Los oídos externos grandes le ayudan para transmitir 
de calor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mammalia, placentalia, fleischfressende Tiere, Wüste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mammalia, placentalia, carnivores, désert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mammalia, placentalia, carnivores, deserto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mammalia, placentalia, carnivori, deserto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mammalia, placentalia, carnivores, έρημος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mammalia, placentalia, carnívoros, desierto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
